page.title: 12Farming Conclusion
page.content: From this survey all farms in the area of Hazelrigg are mostly arable farms, 73% of these arable farms have {livestock.}This is because it is cheaper to do arable farming then to keep livestock. There are five farms in the area of Hazelrigg which is 12 sq kilometres most farms have 29.62% of{grazing land, 42.67% of{cultivated}land. Out of four farms all of the farms had a tractor, three of the farms had a silage spreader, all of the farms had a combine harvesters and two of the farms other machinery. The conclusion is that the area of Hazelrigg is 74.05% farming and mostly arable and not a lot of livestock farming
